item.title: Boolean that didn't work
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Mod Demolish, post:2, topic:284545”][quote author=laveerre link=topic=375997.msg2833371#msg2833371 date=1245501322]
public boolean isInGreaterGame() {
if((absX >= 2753 && absX <= 2777 && absY >= 4702 && absY <=4732))
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

What’s wrong?
[/quote]

make if((absX >= 2753 && absX <= 2777 && absY >= 4702 && absY <=4732))

like this if ((absX >= 2753 && absX <= 2777 && absY >= 4702 && absY <=4732) {[/quote]
Doing this would not help at all.

item.title: Boolean that didn't work
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

I get these errors as i try to compile:
client.java:5229: illegal start of expression
public boolean isInGreaterGame() {
^
client.java:5229: ‘;’ expected
public boolean isInGreaterGame() {
^
client.java:5232: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
Finished!
Jatka painamalla mitä tahansa näppäintä . . .

And my boolean looks like this:
public boolean isInGreaterGame() {
if((absX >= 2753 && absX <= 2777 && absY >= 4702 && absY <=4732))
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

What’s wrong?

Read full topic
